creator: seki@sysrdc.ns-sol.co.jp
text:
I was tryng to test JDBC Request with Insert statement, but Request was not 
looped. In Select statement, Request is looped normally. 
I suppouse, in Insert statement, JMeter can't get information that Request is 
done normally, and do next request.
Reproduced this in 1.7. No longer happens in 1.8. Closing as FIXED.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
